channel.title: Diablo III
channel.description:
[img]http://img238.imageshack.us/img238/5600/43730692dl4.jpg[/img]
[code]http://www.blizzard.com/diablo3/?rhtml=y[/code]
Seems like a great addition to the series. Good graphics, excellent game play...
I personally shit my pants when I saw this.

item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @satanatas satanatas
item.description:
@satanatas wrote:

can’t wait for it to come out…diablo is an awesome series and im ready to whoop some more demon ass!

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

That’s ok though, games ALWAYS suck when publishers rush the release date. They turn into hyped up pieces of junk

item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @Andrew Andrew
item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:18, topic:263679”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=348239.msg2826071#msg2826071 date=1245000977]

It’s been nearly a year since D3 has been up, sort of dissapointing. Anyone hear anything about it recently?

Still has not been released . Personally, I have not heard anything.
[/quote]

d3 rumors have been going around since 1999 don’t expect anything too soon.[/quote]

Hate to tell you man - Diablo II was said to be released in 1998. It came out the end of 2000.

Starcraft 2 Trailers started a few years ago I believe - it still isn’t out, and was SUPPOSED to come out a few months ago. Diablo 3 is far away my friend.

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:21, topic:263679”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=348239.msg2826092#msg2826092 date=1245002522]

It’s been nearly a year since D3 has been up, sort of dissapointing. Anyone hear anything about it recently?

Still has not been released . Personally, I have not heard anything.

d3 rumors have been going around since 1999 don’t expect anything too soon.

But there was a trailer on Blizzard’s site…
[/quote]

It’ll be next year. Blizzard have said they are doing one major title release a year, and I’d imagine this year will be SC2, since its further along than D3 is.[/quote]
sc2 is going to be a pile of silab…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282

I hope its good. But they’ve destroyed WoW, lets hope that dosen’t carry over to Diablo.

item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Square, post:13, topic:263679”][quote author=the bank link=topic=348239.msg2680100#msg2680100 date=1235314026]

[quote author=Ske link=topic=348239.msg2679942#msg2679942 date=1235303853]
When will it be released?
[/quote]Quote from blizzard:

It’s too early to estimate Diablo III’s release date. As with all Blizzard Entertainment games, our goal is to create a game that is as fun, balanced, and polished as possible. We intend to take as much time developing Diablo III as is necessary to ensure the game meets our own high expectations and those of our players.

[/quote]That’s been up there for ever. It seems like it’s going to be another year under development =. I remember seeing it up there over the summer, and now it’s almost spring. Last time i checked they only had a class or two updated.

Diablo is possibly the best rpg series ever. <3[/quote]Shame it isn’t rpg games at all. It’s hack & slash The best rpg game series of all time are definately baldur’s gate

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @Square Square
item.description:
@Square wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:5, topic:263679”][quote author=Ske link=topic=348239.msg2679942#msg2679942 date=1235303853]
When will it be released?
[/quote]Quote from blizzard:

[quote]It’s too early to estimate Diablo III’s release date. As with all Blizzard Entertainment games, our goal is to create a game that is as fun, balanced, and polished as possible. We intend to take as much time developing Diablo III as is necessary to ensure the game meets our own high expectations and those of our players.[/quote][/quote]That’s been up there for ever. It seems like it’s going to be another year under development =. I remember seeing it up there over the summer, and now it’s almost spring. Last time i checked they only had a class or two updated.

Diablo is possibly the best rpg series ever. <3

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:8, topic:263679”]How do you guys all know its an amazing game when it isn’t going to be out until 2010 at the earliest, probably 2011 :S[/quote]They don’t know, they assume. Just like anyone else anticipating a release for their beloved game titles.

I for one can’t wait, as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

Mopman:

How do you guys all know its an amazing game when it isn’t going to be out until 2010 at the earliest, probably 2011 :S

They just use the story line of the last game, which was pretty good.
Game one : Go down a dungeon until you go down soo deep you reach hell, kill Diablo, Jizz in your pants.
Game two: All the classes you could chose from the first game have gone “corrupted” and because the demon escaped after shoving the soul shard into their heads. You kill the fuckers, then Kill Diablo and Baal.
Game three: Same shit, except the previous classes have gone insane… Kill the fuckers, kill any bosses.

Read full topic
